description: This source file implements control functions for a 'DSL Home Model' object record within a TR-069 based management system. It includes functions for populating, managing, and removing object and variable records, handling parameter changes, and child object lifecycle events.

classes.name: DSLH_OBJ_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents an object record with control functions for a TR-069 management system.

classes.name: DSLH_VAR_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a variable record within an object record.

classes.name: DSLH_OBJ_ENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents an object entity used for generating object records.

classes.name: DSLH_VAR_ENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents a variable entity used for generating variable records.

classes.name: DSLH_OBJ_CONTROLLER_OBJECT
classes.description: Controller object for managing object instances.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroPopulateObjRecords(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Populates object records under a parent object from its entity description, dynamically handling tables and non-table objects.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroPopulateVarRecords(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Populates variable records under an object including its children.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroParamValueChanged(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pParamName)
methods.description: Notifies the system when a parameter value has changed, potentially triggering notifications and persistence.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroChildObjectCreated(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hChildObjController,ULONG ulInstanceNumber)
methods.description: Handles creation of a new child object instance, initializing and populating its records.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroChildObjectRemoved(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulInstanceNumber)
methods.description: Handles removal of a child object instance, cleaning up associated records.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroPopulateObjRecordByName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pObjName)
methods.description: Populates a specific object record identified by name, including all its children.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhObjroDeleteObjRecordByName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pObjName)
methods.description: Deletes the object record identified by name including associated variable records for tables.
